TopicTitle: Trying to load career mode now freezes game

Articles.Content:
I'm playing KSP enhanced edition on PS4

Radial Preset

Late career mode

Not what sure happened to cause this bug, but now when I attempt to load my career mode from the home screen, the game freezes every time, right at the "Resume Saved" screen.

I attempted to delete and redownload my save from the cloud, but the save still always freezes the game.

Please help!
